widgets_values:
PromptBrain Source

üìù Creates or loads BRAIN data

Options:
‚Ä¢ <auto_find> - Auto-discover brain files
‚Ä¢ <new> - Create new BRAIN data
‚Ä¢ filename.brain - Load specific file

üîß Auto-init creates DB if needed
üìä Shows loaded data in inspector

üß† BRAIN Data Source Workflow

‚úÖ Purpose:
Create or load BRAIN data for use in
PromptBrain learning and generation

üìã Steps:
1. Configure source options
2. Queue prompt
3. Check status output
4. Inspect BRAIN data structure

üîç Debug Info:
‚Ä¢ Status text shows load success
‚Ä¢ Inspector shows data structure
‚Ä¢ Console logs DB operations

‚öôÔ∏è Parameters:
file_path: Brain file location
  - <auto_find> = auto-discover
  - <new> = create new
  - 'name.brain' = load specific

auto_init: Auto-create DB
create_new: Force new creation

üí° Tips:
‚Ä¢ First run creates new DB
‚Ä¢ Auto-find searches directory
‚Ä¢ Use descriptive filenames
‚Ä¢ DB stored in project root

workspace_info.description: Template for BrainsXDEV_PromptBrainSource - Creates or loads BRAIN custom datatype for PromptBrain workflows
